Title: Episode #1.5
Writer: Dennis Kelly (creator), Dennis Kelly, Huw Kennair-Jones (original idea), Mark Aldridge (original idea), Clare McDonald (original idea)
Actors: Adeel Akhtar, James Fox, Paul Higgins, Geraldine James
Plot: The gang's attempt to disrupt The Network's plans backfires leaving one of them in danger. Arby's confession to Jessica has damaging repercussions while Becky is left with an impossible choice.
